nodes.documentation:
ERC20 transferFrom attack protection: https://github.com/DecentLabs/dcm-poc/issues/57
approve should be called when allowed[_spender] == 0. To increment allowed value is better
to use this function to avoid 2 calls (and wait until the first transaction is mined)
Based on MonolithDAO Token.sol
nodes.name: increaseApproval

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "allowance must be >= 0 even with 0 amount"

arguments.value: allowance must be >= 0 even with 0 amount

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "allowance must be >= 0 even with 0 amount"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "balance must be >= amount + transfer fee"

arguments.value: balance must be >= amount + transfer fee

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "balance must be >= amount + transfer fee"
